name: Swordsman of Persia: Browser
description:
Swordsman Of Persia: Ancient Story is a free third person action platformer game set in ancient Persia.

The Story

The protagonist is named Bahram, who lives in a small town called Khavarshahr. One day he goes on a mission, but when he returns, he sees that his city has been invaded and the invaders have killed many people and taken others captive along with the king's daughter. Bahram then embarks on an adventurous journey to seek revenge as well as frees his people.

Game Features

  • Fun and exciting action/platformer gameplay
  • Easy to pick up and play
  • For fans of hack and slash games
  • Mix of souls like combat with Prince of Persia 
  •  Story driven with over one hour length

Download PC version with higher graphics:

https://hammergames.itch.io/swordsman-of-persia
